title: Ryan Atkinson
description: blog of a web developer making open source community software

items.title: A year of making open source web community software
items.summary: I discuss my work on open source community software called Felt over the last year, giving a brief overview of the design and technology choices, and announcing our newsletter and podcast at FeltCoop.

items.title: Modeling virtual social spaces: in this house we post cat pics on Saturday
items.summary: Proposing a model for one of the central aspects of online communities: the virtual social space.
